meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order, Pledge of Allegiance, and Roll Call
Public Comments on Items III – VI
Vote to Approve the August 8th, 2024 Meeting Minutes
Welcoming Address from District 1 Council Member
agenda_items.description: Dallas City Councilman for District 1, Chad West will visit with the Veteran Affairs Commission and address them.

agenda_items.title: Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment Update
agenda_items.description: The commission will be updated on the progress made in the procurement process regarding the Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment. This will include discussion of major milestones and timelines.

agenda_items.title: Discussion and Vote to Approve Recommendation for Dr. Katina Robertson’s Proclamation
agenda_items.description: The commission will review the proclamation to honor the late commissioner for District 3, Dr. Katina Robertson. That will be followed up with discussion, and a vote to approve it and sending it to the Mayor’s Office. The proposed date to present the proclamation is Wednesday, November 6 during the City Council Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Announcements
agenda_items.description: Boards & Commissions reminded coordinators of the Annual Report Due February 1, 2025. The 2024 Fiscal Year concludes in September. The Annual Report will be from October 2023 to September 2024. A draft will be prepared for October’s meeting. VAC website update- Our office would like to include an online service to the Veteran Affairs Commission’s website to better serve veterans. Details will be sent out in a separate email.
